=== Welcome ===
I am the Kernel Bug Triager for the Canonical Kernel Team. I am responsible for Bug triage as well as gathering and presenting high priority bug information to the team on a weekly basis. 

<nowiki>[[JeremyFoshee-Links | Links]]</nowiki>

=== Goals ===
* Help Ubuntu become the most widely used stable Linux distribution
* Address high profile and priority bugs and get their fixes implemented
* Improve community participation in bug triage of Kernel and distribution packages

=== Recent Happenings ===

* I gave a User Days session on July 10th 2010 about the kernel and the Ubuntu Kernel team. You can find the IRC log <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UserDays/07102010/What%20is%20a%20kernel,%20and%20why%20do%20i%20need%20it|here]]</nowiki>.

* I gave a Kernel triage chat on July 14th for Ubuntu developer Week discussing subsystem tagging, triage summit etc. Logs can be found <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MeetingLogs/devweek1007/KernelTriage|here]]</nowiki>.
